body.p:
Center Metcalfe County Ky June 5th 1862
To the Honerable Beriah Magoffin
Sir you will please grant me a Resignation of my office as one of the Justice of the Peace. for the above named county in the 5th Precinct.

and I would Respectully Recimend to your Honor W, O. Pace and T G. Sheffield Either as suitable men to fill the vancancy, and would be glad if it met with Honors approbation, ^that you would appoint them one^ Either of them will Except of the office
